users.name: BraveHonor: A NEW Battle Royale Game

posts.content: Worldwide News Network will be shutting down temporarily in the face of this pandemic. To all of our employees and readers, please stay safe.

posts.content: BraveHonor's servers are READY for all of you GAMERS! We're adding a NEW expansion - LEVEL 80 PSIONIKA GEAR! A new update will be hitting your consoles TONIGHT at 7PM PST!

replies.content: Stream canceled for tonight guys :( Not feeling too well.
